attributes.action: transfer non-working spouse/partner tax allowance to the breadwinner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see the government allow the personal tax allowance to be transfered from the non-working spouse/partner to the breadwinner. Example: 1 person working (spouse/partner bringing up family)=5,220 tax free, 2 people working=10,440 tax free income.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
